remarks: { A , B } is a linearly dependent set within the ` ZZ `-module ` ZZ X. ZZ ` (see example in [Roman] p. 112).  (Contributed by AV, 22-May-2019.)  (Revised by AV, 10-Jun-2019.)
statement:
zlmodzxzldep.z $e |- Z = ( ZZring freeLMod { 0 , 1 } ) $.
zlmodzxzldep.a $e |- A = { <. 0 , 3 >. , <. 1 , 6 >. } $.
zlmodzxzldep.b $e |- B = { <. 0 , 2 >. , <. 1 , 4 >. } $.
zlmodzxzldep $p |- { A , B } linDepS Z $.
